name: All-in-One Age Calculator
short_description:
All-in-One Age Calculator Can Calculate Age in a Second and Gives Result in Different Formats. These Formats Are Given Below...  
Display Age in
                    Years,Months and Days
                    Months,Weeks and Days
                    Weeks and Days
                    Only Days
                    Hours , Minutes and Seconds
summary: AIO Can Calculate Age in a Second and Gives Result in Different Forms.
